text: ql - 'ayuha alrasul -: ya 'ayuha alnaas ma 'ana 'iilaa mundhir lakum mblligh ean allah rsalth. faladhin amanuu biallah wrswlh, wastqr dhlk fi qlwbhm, waeamiluu al'aemal alsalht, lahum eind allah eafw ean dhunubihim wamaghfirat ystr biha ma sdr eanhum min mesyt, warizq hasan la ynqte wahu aljn. waladhin ajthdu fi alkyd l'ibtal ayat alquran baltkdhyb mshaqyn mghalbyn, 'uwlayik hum 'ahl alnaar almwqdt, yadkhulunaha wybqwn fiha abdana
